project.name: C-C774A-OSSL-08-ST03-DT02-DF15-CF18-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C774A-OSSL-08-ST03-DT02-DF15-CF18-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key Read an unsigned hex int from the input. If unsigned is > FFFF, do nothing. Otherwise, open that many files for writing, without closing the file handles. Output if any of the opens fail. The opens will fail if we try to open more than 1021 files.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="FF" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C774A-OSSL-08-ST03-DT02-DF15-CF18-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Generate SSL certificate and private key Read an unsigned hex int from the input. If unsigned is > FFFF, do nothing. Otherwise, open that many files for writing, without closing the file handles. Output if any of the opens fail. The opens will fail if we try to open more than 1021 files.
iopair.run_command: req -new -newkey rsa:2048 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -keyout good-10/server.key -out good-10/server.crt -subj "/C=SP/ST=The Moon/L=TheDarkSide/O=KSP/OU=Moon Department/CN=ksp.moon"

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="FF" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-10-1 AND GOOD-10-2 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
